'''Phil Redmond''' was the writer and designer of the video game ''[[Riders of Rohan (video game)|Riders of Rohan]]''.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/riders.html Riders of Rohan] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 4 January 2011)</ref><ref>[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=6 MEristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 7 (retrieved 4 January 2011)</ref>
